mapper.select: select p.product_no, product_name, product_price, category_no, manufacturer_no, alcohol_volume, capacity, cargo_space, orderable_status from product p left join inbound_orderable ino on p.product_no = ino.product_no
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_price, category_no, manufacturer_no, alcohol_volume, capacity, cargo_space) values ( #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{categoryNo}, #{manufacturerNo}, #{alcoholVolume}, #{capacity}, #{cargoSpace} )
mapper.update: update product set product_name = #{productName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, category_no = #{categoryNo}, manufacturer_no = #{manufacturerNo} where product_no = #{productNo}
